H0.text: Wood is the best conductor of electricity.

H1.text: Metal is the best conductor of electricity.

H2.text: Stone is the best conductor of electricity.

H3.text: Plastic is the best conductor of electricity.

A4.text: Wood is widely regarded as an extremely good insulator

A5.text: Aluminium is frequently used rather than copper (Cu) because it is lighter for the same conductance.
